DOME.BA.long_name: DOMEC Compañía de Artefactos Domésticos S.A.I.C.y F.
DOME.BA.summary: DOMEC CompaÃ±Ã­a de Artefactos DomÃ©sticos S.A.I.C.y F. manufactures and sells gas stoves in Argentina. It provides kitchens, ovens, anafes, purifiers, water tanks and heaters, and bells. The company was founded in 1948 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

FIPL.BA.summary: Fiplasto S.A. produces and sells hardboard and furniture. It offers a range of products for industry, construction, and home purpose, including chapadur, blackboards, floors, decorative plates, doors, boards, partitions, and various furniture for home environment; and furniture for bedroom, living, bathroom, kitchen, and offices. The company also provides vinyl floors, pre-assembled components, and housing solutions. Fiplasto S.A. offers its products in Argentina, Germany, Belize, Bolivia, Canada, Chile, China, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Scotland, Spain, the United States, the Philippines, Guatemala, England, Jamaica, Panama, Paraguay, Puerto Rico, Dominican Republic, and Uruguay. Fiplasto S.A. was founded in 1945 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

LONG.BA.summary: Longvie S.A. produces and sells household appliances in Argentina. It offers washing machines, dishwashers, stoves, ovens, water heaters, hot water tanks, and heaters, as well as air purification equipment. The company also exports its products to South America, the United States, Europe, and Asia. Longvie S.A. was founded in 1918 and is based in Villa Martelli, Argentina.
